00034 snort::snort(string plugin_id, map<string,string> properties)
00035 {
00036     
00037     if(!initialize_plugin(properties))
00038         throw runtime_error("Snort plugin could not be initialized");
00039

00061 bool snort::initialize_plugin(std::map<std::string, std::string> properties)
00062 {
00063     log_file_ = properties["log_file"];
00064     
00065     ifstream file(log_file_.c_str());
00066     if(!file) {
00067         cerr << "Log file does not exist or your user cannot read it" << endl;
00068         return false;
00069     }
00070     file.close();
00071 
00072     sigar_open(&sig_);
00073 
00074     sigar_net_info_t net_info;
00075     sigar_net_info_get(sig_, &net_info);
00076     
00077     strcpy(hostname_,net_info.host_name);
00078 
00079     
00080     //Setting today's date
00081     time_t rawtime;
00082     struct tm * timeinfo;
00083     
00084     time ( &rawtime );
00085     timeinfo = localtime ( &rawtime );  
00086     latest_date_.mon = timeinfo->tm_mon + 1;
00087     latest_date_.mday = timeinfo->tm_mday;
00088     latest_date_.hour = timeinfo->tm_hour;
00089     latest_date_.min = timeinfo->tm_min;
00090     latest_date_.sec = timeinfo->tm_sec;
00091     
00092     this_year_ = timeinfo->tm_year;
00093     
00094     
00095     return true;
00096 
00097 }

00106 void snort::update_alertsmap()
00107 {
00108   
00109     ifstream file(log_file_.c_str());
00110   
00111     string line;
00112     vector<string> alert;
00113     char buf;
00114     bool first_time = true;
00115   
00116     file.seekg(0,ios::beg);
00117     ifstream::pos_type pos_beg = file.tellg();
00118     file.seekg(0,ios::end);
00119     ifstream::pos_type pos_end = file.tellg();
00120     
00121     //Reposition the file pointer to the last byte in the file
00122     file.seekg(-1,ios::end);
00123 
00124   
00125     date next_latest_date = latest_date_;
00126   
00127     //Processing newer alerts from snort's alert.csv
00128     if(pos_beg != pos_end) { //Checks if the file is not empty
00129         while(file.tellg() != pos_beg) { //Checks whether there are more lines
00130 
00131             buf = (char ) (file.peek());
00132 
00133             if(buf != '\n') { //Skips '\n'
00134                 line += buf;
00135             }
00136 
00137             else if(!line.empty()) { //Skips empty lines
00138                 reverse(line.begin(),line.end());
00139 
00140                 std::vector<std::string> strs;
00141                 strs = split_string(line,',');
00142                 
00143 
00144                 if(strs.size()==26 ||strs.size()==27) { //Checks that the line is OK
00145                     if(is_newer(strs[0])) { //Checks alos that the alert is newer
00146                         struct ids_alert_without_timestamp aux;
00147                         aux.sig_generator = strs[1];
00148                         aux.sig_id = strs[2];
00149                         aux.sig_rev  = strs[3];
00150                         aux.msg  = strs[4];
00151                         aux.proto = strs[5];
00152                         aux.src = strs[6];
00153                         aux.srcport = strs[7];
00154                         aux.dst = strs[8];
00155                         aux.dstport = strs[9];
00156                         aux.ethsrc = strs[10];
00157                         aux.ethdst = strs[11];
00158                         aux.ethlen = strs[12];
00159                         aux.tcpflags = strs[13];
00160                         aux.tcpseq = strs[14];  
00161                         aux.tcpack = strs[15];
00162                         aux.tcplen = strs[16];
00163                         aux.tcpwindow = strs[17];
00164                         aux.ttl = strs[18];
00165                         aux.tos = strs[19];
00166                         aux.id = strs[20];
00167                         aux.dgmlen = strs[21];
00168                         aux.iplen = strs[22];
00169                         aux.icmptype = strs[23];
00170                         aux.icmpcode = strs[24];
00171                         aux.icmpid = strs[25];
00172                         alert_map_[strs[0]] = aux;
00173                         if(first_time) { //Stores the timestamp of the latest alert
00174                             next_latest_date = get_date_from_timestamp(strs[0]);
00175                             next_latest_date.sec += 1;
00176                             first_time = false;
00177                         }
00178                         // if(first_line == true)
00179                         //     end = true;
00180                     }
00181                     else {
00182                         file.close();
00183                         latest_date_ = next_latest_date;
00184                         return;
00185                     }
00186                 }
00187       
00188 
00189                 line.clear();      
00190                 
00191                 
00192             }
00193 
00194             file.seekg(-1,ios::cur); //Next line (line-1)
00195         }
00196     }
00197     file.close();
00198 
00199     // Changes the timestamp of the latest alert
00200     latest_date_ = next_latest_date;
00201 
00202 }

00213 date snort::get_date_from_timestamp(string timestamp)
00214 {
00215 
00216     vector<string> vec;
00217     date dat;
00218   
00219     //Getting month
00220     vec = split_string(timestamp,'/');
00221     dat.mon = atoi(vec[0].c_str());
00222     //Getting month day
00223     vec = split_string(vec[1],'-');
00224     dat.mday = atoi(vec[0].c_str());
00225     //Getting hour, minute and second
00226     vec = split_string(vec[1],'.');
00227     vec = split_string(vec[0],':');
00228     dat.hour = atoi(vec[0].c_str());
00229     dat.min = atoi(vec[1].c_str());
00230     dat.sec = atoi(vec[2].c_str());
00231   
00232     
00233     return dat;
00234 }

00236 
00246 bool snort::is_newer(string timestamp)
00247 {
00248     date timestamp_date;
00249     timestamp_date = get_date_from_timestamp(timestamp);
00250   
00251     //Newer month
00252     if(latest_date_.mon < timestamp_date.mon)
00253         return true;
00254     //Newer mday                
00255     if(latest_date_.mon == timestamp_date.mon &&        \
00256        latest_date_.mday  < timestamp_date.mday)
00257         return true;
00258     //Newer hour                
00259     if(latest_date_.mon == timestamp_date.mon &&                      \
00260        latest_date_.mday == timestamp_date.mday  &&                   \
00261        latest_date_.hour < timestamp_date.hour)
00262         return true;
00263     //Newer min                 
00264     if(latest_date_.mon == timestamp_date.mon &&                      \
00265        latest_date_.mday == timestamp_date.mday  &&                   \
00266        latest_date_.hour == timestamp_date.hour  &&                   \
00267        latest_date_.min < timestamp_date.min)
00268         return true;
00269     //Newer sec         
00270     if(latest_date_.mon == timestamp_date.mon &&                       \
00271        latest_date_.mday == timestamp_date.mday  &&                    \
00272        latest_date_.hour == timestamp_date.hour  &&                    \
00273        latest_date_.min == timestamp_date.min    &&                    \
00274        latest_date_.sec <= timestamp_date.sec)
00275         return true;
00276   
00277     return false;
00278   
00279 }

00281 
00292 bool snort::generate_and_publish_information(DDSDynamicDataWriter *writer,
00293                                              DDS_DynamicData *data)
00294 {
00295 
00296     DDS_DynamicData *source_node_info_t_data =
00297         new DDS_DynamicData(NULL, DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_PROPERTY_DEFAULT);
00298     DDS_DynamicData *target_node_info_t_data =
00299         new DDS_DynamicData(NULL, DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_PROPERTY_DEFAULT);
00300 
00301 
00302     update_alertsmap();
00303     
00304     if(!alert_map_.empty()) {
00305         
00306         // Filling Host Information--------------------------------------------------
00307         
00308         
00309         data->set_string("hostname",
00310                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00311                          hostname_);
00312         
00313 
00314         map<string,struct ids_alert_without_timestamp>::iterator it;
00315         for(it = alert_map_.begin(); it != alert_map_.end(); ++it) {
00316                   
00317             //Information related to the source of the alert
00318             data->bind_complex_member(*source_node_info_t_data, "source",
00319                                       DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED);
00320           
00321             source_node_info_t_data->set_long("prt",
00322                                               DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00323                                               atoi(it->second.srcport.c_str()));
00324 
00325             source_node_info_t_data->set_string("network_addr",
00326                                                 DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00327                                                 (char*)it->second.src.c_str());
00328 
00329             source_node_info_t_data->set_string("mac",
00330                                                 DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00331                                                 (char*)it->second.ethsrc.c_str());
00332 
00333             data->unbind_complex_member(*source_node_info_t_data);
00334             
00335 
00336 
00337             //Information related to the target of the alert
00338             data->bind_complex_member(*target_node_info_t_data, "target",
00339                                       DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED);
00340 
00341             target_node_info_t_data->set_long("prt",
00342                                               DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00343                                               atoi(it->second.dstport.c_str()));
00344           
00345             target_node_info_t_data->set_string("network_addr",
00346                                                 DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00347                                                 (char*) it->second.dst.c_str());
00348           
00349             target_node_info_t_data->set_string("mac",
00350                                                 DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00351                                                 (char*)it->second.ethdst.c_str());
00352 
00353 
00354             data->unbind_complex_member(*target_node_info_t_data);
00355 
00356 
00357 
00358             //Timestamp of the alert
00359             struct date aux = get_date_from_timestamp(it->first);
00360           
00361 
00362             struct tm *timeinfo_aux;
00363             time_t rawtime;
00364             time(&rawtime);
00365             
00366             timeinfo_aux = localtime ( &rawtime );
00367             timeinfo_aux->tm_year = this_year_;
00368             timeinfo_aux->tm_mon = aux.mon -1;
00369             timeinfo_aux->tm_mday = aux.mday;
00370             timeinfo_aux->tm_hour = aux.hour;
00371             timeinfo_aux->tm_min = aux.min;
00372             timeinfo_aux->tm_sec = aux.sec;
00373             rawtime = mktime(timeinfo_aux);
00374 
00375             data->set_long("ts",
00376                            DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00377                            rawtime);
00378                            
00379 
00380             //Alert message
00381             data->set_string("msg",
00382                              DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00383                              (char*) it->second.msg.c_str());
00384 
00385             
00386             
00387             publish_information(writer, data);
00388         }
00389         
00390         alert_map_.clear();     
00391         
00392     }
00393     
00394     return true;
00395 }

00397 
00408 vector<string> snort::split_string(string str, char element)
00409 {
00410     
00411     istringstream str_to_split(str);
00412     vector<string> tokens;
00413     string aux_string;
00414     
00415     while(getline(str_to_split,aux_string,element)) {
00416         tokens.push_back(aux_string);
00417     }
00418     
00419     return tokens;
00420 }
